name: shieft
description:
Move with arrows or awsd (zqsd for azerty users).
Display inventory with space.

Navigate trought a morphing level and collect maps.

Made in 48 hours for the 35th ludum dare.

Theme was "ShapeShift"

submition page : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=8002
